data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,474 believers in Western that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Western, Gambia

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Western, Gambia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Western, Gambia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Western, Gambia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Gunjur
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Gunjur, Western, Gambia.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Western.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Western that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Western, Gambia has a population of 492,900.

We estimate Western has 4,474 people who might know Jesus, 13,428 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 474,997 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 110 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Western access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
